Articles.Content:
Ok, cool. So, you settin' up?

It's already set-up right? read the previous post

It's already set-up right? read the previous post

No, I mean your tanks in-game.

Load the .persist file astecarmyman posted, spawn your tanks (2, as per the rules on the first battle post), and place them somewhere on the island at least 3 km away from anyone else.

Then put the file up for DL and maybe show a screenshot or two of where your tanks are and which ones you've used.

Guess what?

I'M BACK!!!!!

I've been having a lot of trouble with my computer recently so I won't be in any battles but I couldn't sit out any longer.

Core Industries (my new company) is in business!

Edited April 1, 2015 by CrypticCross345
So... you going to set up Zamo, or can we skip you?

Well, it's been quite a while. I think someone is going to have to set up shortly. I'll place my tanks if we don't hear from anyone else soon.

Edited March 31, 2015 by SuperHappySquid

Well, it's been quite a while. I think someone is going to have to set up shortly. I'll place my tanks if we don't here from anyone else soon.

u should probs do dat

u should probs do dat

Aye, he should.
Sorry it's been a while I forgot. Somebody please post ahead of me.

Sorry it's been a while I forgot. Somebody please post ahead of me.

Alright, you're up SuperHappySquid!

KUSC forces have arrived on the scene!

I've brought with me a medium and a light tank. The KUSC - Renegade and the KUSC - Maverick A. Both are reasonably well armed, armoured and mobile.

I've marked my spawn with a flag and both tanks are about 7-8km from the other groups.

I'm afraid I don't really know who's next, so I guess whoever is ready should just go.

Persistent file: http://www./download/1m928umomh41ztj/persistent.sfs

Yup. :3 Good setup, and you'll be on team one with me!
Can I be on Team Two (2) instead? How many tanks can we deploy? Is there a limit?

Can I be on Team Two (2) instead? How many tanks can we deploy? Is there a limit?

Up to two tanks, with one being a light tank (around 10 tons or so in mass w/ a full ammo load) and the other being a medium tank.

And yes, you can be on team two.

quick question, I have been following this thread for several months trying to reverse engineer all of your discoveries, but I can't figure out how to get any reasonable amount of ammo onto my tanks, they always end up with just 1 or 2 shots. How do you add more ammo close together?

quick question, I have been following this thread for several months trying to reverse engineer all of your discoveries, but I can't figure out how to get any reasonable amount of ammo onto my tanks, they always end up with just 1 or 2 shots. How do you add more ammo close together?

generally you can only group more missiles together based on their diameter, which is usually no larger than a small probecore's width. If you are trying to fit many missiles on a turret, generally you will only be able to fit one or two, if your goal is to get alot of missiles make a tank destroyer like vessel with a large casemate holding all the missiles together. (Or you could go for a guided missile carrier)

quick question, I have been following this thread for several months trying to reverse engineer all of your discoveries, but I can't figure out how to get any reasonable amount of ammo onto my tanks, they always end up with just 1 or 2 shots. How do you add more ammo close together?

I normally clip the separatrons in my missiles in tightly, to make it easier to mount multiple missiles in close proximity.

And I'd advise looking for examples to help you out.
